official_title: To extend Corridor N of the Appalachian development highway system from its current northern terminus at Corridor M, near Ebensburg, Pennsylvania, to Corridor T, near Salamanca, New York, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Corridor N Extension Act of 2011 - Designates as an addition to Corridor N of the Appalachian development highway system a 149-mile segment from Corridor M to Corridor T in Maryland and Pennsylvania.

titles.title: To extend Corridor N of the Appalachian development highway system from its current northern terminus at Corridor M, near Ebensburg, Pennsylvania, to Corridor T, near Salamanca, New York, and for other purposes.
